name: GBA Video ~ Lofi Radio
description: Lofi radio on GBA ~ beats to chill/study to. You will hear over 20 minutes of lofi music by Lo Fidelity Cassette Tape Perplexity and the Boys. You will see a loop of the perplexed boy studying at a desk. The video will automatically start over when finished. Hold A to fast forward (fast forwarding for too long on original hardware will crash the game). Click B to start over. Available on cartridges. Send a message on IG if interested: @cassettetapeperplexity
